response:
Ipsilateral right third-nerve palsy with ptosis and a dilated pupil, contralateral (left) spastic hemiparesis with hyperreflexia and extensor plantar, contralateral impairment of vibration/proprioception with positive Romberg, and ipsilateral limb ataxia/dysmetria indicate a single right midbrain lesion involving the oculomotor fascicle, cerebral peduncle, medial lemniscus and cerebellar outflow pathways.

lesion_locations = ["right midbrain"]
